Package com.xmlmind.ditac.convert

Implementation of the ditac command-line utility.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
FOConverter Interface allowing the Converter to use the services of an XSL-FO processor such as Apache FOP, RenderX XEP, etc.
 

Class Summary
ConsoleErrorListener An implementation of ErrorListener which displays its messages on a Console.
Converter Implementation of the ditac command-line utility.
ExternalFOConverter An implementation of FOConverter based on an external command-line utility such as /opt/xep/xep, D:\opt\fop\fop.bat, etc.
ImageCopier An implementation of ImageHandler which simply copies its image arguments to the directory specified in its parameter string.
StyleSheetCache A simple XSL stylesheet cache.
 

Enum Summary
Format Output format of a Converter.
 

Package com.xmlmind.ditac.convert Description

Implementation of the ditac command-line utility.

com.xmlmind.ditac.convert.Converter, the class which is at the core of the ditac command-line utility, has been designed in order to be easily embedded in any Java desktop or server-side application. However a lower-level alternative to embedding Converter consists in embedding com.xmlmind.ditac.preprocess.PreProcessor.
